description: When Jackie's ex-lover Noah dies, she decides the best and quickest way to get over the love of her life is to hold a personal ritual with Noah's ashes. Jackie consumes the ashes for 12 days, hoping the pain will subside with her profound reaction to Noah's death. While she and her partner-in-crime Nick, Noah’s brother, spend the time in the closed space her apartment, they slowly become consumed by Noah's tragedy.
name: Vol. 1

description:
A romance novel told in twelve individual vignettes, 12 Reasons Why I Love Herexplores the relationship of young couple Gwen and Evan, traversing the ups and downs of their romantic life together. Told out of chronological order, these specific slices of love focus on all the things that make two people care for one another, be it something small like telling a joke or larger aspects of life, like the dreams that drive us or the secrets we keep. When put together, the pieces make a whole in the same way two lovers join as one.

Crafted by Jamie S. Rich & newcomer Joelle Jones, this beautiful and lyrical work is a unique experiment in graphic storytelling, combining the things we see with the words we say to give us a glimpse of everything we feel.
name: GN

description: An amphibious armada from the farthest reaches of space has its green-with-envy eyes on this mud ball we call earth! They're gonna melt the ice caps and make our world one big swamp! The only thing standing between our fair planet and "The Invasion of the Froglodytes" are Monkeyman & O'Brien, two beams of hope in a world gone mad!
name: The Invasion of the Froglodytes!

description: In an effort to find Monkeyman's other-dimensional home, Monkeyman and O'Brien go "Into the Terminus," the boundary zone that links all dimensions! What they find, however, is a colossal, armored insectoid -- Quash, the evil overlord of the Terminus! Will Monkeyman and O'Brien find their way back to earth? Will they find Monkeyman's home? Will they even make it out of the Terminus alive?
name: Into the Terminus!

description: Large-format, hardbound book from Diva Graphics is a series of sketches and notes from the author all about Druuna
Published by Heavy Metal in 1998
G.I. Joe learns of Cobra's plan to place warheads in South America and Antartica. Teaming up with Destro and the Baroness, the Joes split into five teams in order to defeat Cobra.
name: Enemies In Need

description: The Mark's tightly controlled revolution gets out of control when his followers begin a series of assassinations--of innocent citizens! No one is safe as blood runs in the streets! Story by Jerry Prosser, art by Wayne Tanaka. The Mecha crew returned to Earth in the giant space fortress Deephold, only to find their arrival greeted by a squadron of Air Force interceptors armed with deadly intentions! Mach speed combat in the Florida skies! Story by Tim Eldred, art by Harrison Fong and Robert Caracol. The Mask, delighted by his newfound powers, decides to avenge himself on everyone who ever wronged him--the clerk at the grocery store...his third grade teacher...everyone! Gratuitous violence has never been this much fun!

Buzzard must exploit an inside source to discover what the thing is that calls itself Labrazio, and determine if they've any hope of defeating it as the tension between the Goon and Labrazio gangs erupts into an all out war.

Eric Powell's critically acclaimed series The Goon continues, with Dave Stewart on colors.

Overview:

The Terminators never sleep. They don't need food or water. The heat of the desert gives them no pause. The darkness of night does not halt their deadly gaze. Bullets won't stop them. Their humanity cannot be appealed to-because they have none. Sent from the future, their mission is clear and unrelenting: to erase the lives of any who threaten their future dominance, any who would attempt to deny the rise of the Machine. But that which man has created, man can destroy, and so . . . the war for the future begins today.

Reprints/Collects:

  • The Terminator: Hunters and Killers #1-3 (1992)
  • The Terminator: Endgame #1-3 (1992)
  • The Terminator Special #1 (1998)
  • The Terminator #1-4 (1998)
  • The Terminator: The Dark Years #1-4 (1999)
name: Volume 2

description: The Mecha team's awesome mobile fortress Deephold lies at the bottom of the sea--where our heroes discover that the mysteries of the Bermuda Triangle are dangerously real! Story by Tim Eldred, art by Harrison Fong and Robert Caracol. The Mark is caught between terrorist assassinations and military reprisals against innocent citizens. Time is running out as the body count rises! Story by Jerry Prosser, art by Wayne Tanaka. The Mask goes totally out of control as he confronts an army of determined police in a blizzard of gunfire and redline car chases. Teeth grinding chaos as our smiling psycho tears up the streets in a stolen black-and-white!

This new series is guaranteed to live up to its title! Each issue contains 3 twelve-page, action-packed stories of Mayhem! John Arcudi and Doug Mahnke (the team from Dark Horse Presents' Homicide) create strange, violent new tales of The Mask; new writer Tim Eldred and artists Harrison Fong and Robert Caracol carry the cast of Mecha into all-out war; and Jerry Prosser and new artist Wayne Tanaka continue the adventures of The Mark as he battles against the fascist regime if the Archon!

The Mask carouses the city in a stolen police car searching for evildoers to punish--like jaywalkers, rude skateboarders, and dog owners who fail to curb their pets! It's murder at a fever pitch! But there's a big surprise waiting for our leering lunatic as this story-cycle winds to a close! Story by John Arcudi, art by Doug Mahnke. The Mark must cross the Wall to search out the assassin whose killing spree is the cause of mass executions in the ghetto. Will the Mark's single-minded thirst for vengeance be the catalyst for city-wide catastrophe? Story by Jerry Prosser, art by Wayne Tanake. Two new Mecha enter the scene--Earth defender and alien invader--and their clash over the Caribbean is of such fury that the U.S. Navy must attempt to destroy both machines! Story by Tim Eldred, art by Harrison Fong and Robert Caracol.

name: Night Master: Nest of the Dragon

volume.name: Night of the Living Dead: The Beginning
Night of the Living Dead: The Beginning
Night of the Living Dead: The Beginning

name: Genesis

description:
Razors mind is still churning over the memory of her sister Jackie. She wakes to find the cop, Alex London, who rescued her from the Von Drake building. He wants to take down Von Drake as much as Razor but on his terms.. and when they are done he wants Razor to have psychiatric help for her uncontrollable violent mindset. 
  
At his tower block Von Drake is furious with his men that they failed so miserably in clearing up the Razor situation. He kills one of his own minions who thinks he ca take out Razor easily... just to make a point of how dangerous she is. He orders the remaining thugs to kills Stryke who takes them down with ease, saving razors wrist blades for the last one standings.. just to prove she doesn't need Razors toys to win a fight.
 
Bonus Preview Story: Ratsbane (Cyber Thief)

Razor is on the hunt for a 12 year old girl abducted and missing for two days.  She tracks her down to a building where she bursts in and dispatches every man inside with brutal ease. She even takes the head of the main man right in front of the girl after she has already brought him to his knees. 
 
She drops the girl off with the police before following a lead on trafficing from the raid killing all but one inside the warehouse. She leaves him to get a message to his boss about who did this. the man delivers the message and gets his face shredded by Von Drake who contacts Stryke and gives her orders to go after Razor.
name: Souls of Darkness

description: Note about cover date: since issue 1 came out in October 1992, this issue must have been released on a later date. However, the indicia says February 1992. But it also says 'copyright 1993'. So probably the year was not corrected when it came out.
name: Angel In Black, Part 2: One Stryke You're Out

description:
The wait is over, Tim Vigil is ready to unleash an all-new masterpiece, 5 years in the making! Fans of horror rejoice, because Vigil is back and better than ever! Nina has a special place in the evolutionary ladder, she is the bridge between the alien Spidernation and humans. And her choices can help determine who controls the globe in the next century. Biologically part of both worlds, but not fully embraced by either, she is torn between the desire to help the Spidernation expand and the human's quest to rid the world of the greatest predators the Earth has seen! All three issues are already completely drawn with art by the master of the macabre Tim Vigil and special assists from Adam McDaniel. The final pages are simply some of the finest of Tim Vigil's illustrious career! This three issue Webwitch series is completely self-contained and totally accessible to the new reader.

Nina the Webwitch leads the Marines assault on the Spidernation hidden cave. But things go from bad to worse as they underestimate the power of the monsters inside and the Queen takes the Marine Captain for her mate!

VariantCover ArtistltdRelease Date
VigilTim Vigil September 2002
AdrianRon Adrian September 2002
MartinMatt Martin September 2002
WallerKarl Waller September 2002
wrapMatt Martin September 2002
NudeTim Vigil September 2002
PlatinumTim VigilincentiveSeptember 2002
Ryp Connecting (Adult)Juan Jose Ryp

Vigil wraps up his most action-packed series to date with this thrill-a-minute final issue! Nina the Webwitch has lead the Marines' assault on the Spidernation hidden cave. But things have gone horrifically wrong and not only have the Marines been slaughtered, but the Queen has taken control of Nina again! Total Vigil-enhanced carnage from cover-to-cover inside this stunning work that has been five years in the making! If you are a fan of horror or Tim Vigil, you do not want to miss this mind-blowing conclusion!

The final round of the Webwitch against the Spider-Nation. Who will survive?

Ryp Connecting NudeJuan Jose Ryp 3

Here come the Atlanteans, a very powerful people, whose mission is to guide humanity to prevail over Earth. But some folks from Atlantis, leaded by Danik, don´t believe that this is the true mission of their kind and they´re leaving this beautifull land. Others are staying, believing in the words of Capricia. Who´s right or wrong in this issue? You have to read it to get it. It´s worth it!!

Capricia and a small group of Atlanteans who´d stayed behind in stasis are suddenly waken from it by a stranger and are being attacked by even stranger creatures. Atlantis is in ruins and they have to figure out what´s going on and save their people at the same time. Who´s going to solve this mystery.

Caught between the malefic attacks of the Negation, the mounting tension between her teammates, and the cryptic disdain of their benefactor, Capricia nevertheless manages to pull her team together, unaware that Verityn has learned a secret that could tear it apart!

Jeopardy at every turn as the largest Negation attack of all leaves one of the Atlanteans near death. Danik returns with a startling revelation. Geromi is solo against a Negation hit team. Tug and Verityn revive a legendary Atlantean warrior but to do that they must also free his greatest enemy.

The Atlanteans are separated and in grave danger. The Negation have wounded Zephyr and captured Galvan. Capricia is pulled away by Danik while Tug and Verityn face the mystery of a long-dead Atlantean warrior and a monster from a lost race of interstellar travelers. Also, Geromi faces the Negation alone!

The story of Thraxis. He's big, he's hairy, he's got lots of teeth. He also has a tale to tell that reaches from the farthest star to the towers of ancient Atlantis. It's a story that will impact the future of our heroes and those who still sleep in the city of Atlantis. But to hear it Capricia must do battle with the beast man and win. Also, Galvan's dreams take a deadly turn.

Aristophanes has followed the latest Negation invasion back through their own portal. Now he's trapped in their universe with no way back. Or is it the other way around? The warrior-priest from ancient Atlantis is surrounded on all sides by murderous beings set to kill him. That means he's got them right where he wants them! But what will the fate of Galvan be? And you'll never guess who shows up for a guest appearance!

Zephyre, Verityn, and Geromi are in deep trouble as Ganish and Yala continue their deadly game. They must call on the other Atlanteans for help. But what nasty surprise is Aristophanes preparing for them on their return?

Capricia and the others return to Atlantis but aren't safe even there! They are being stalked by old rivals in this landmark issue. For new readers this is the perfect place to start as the saga of CRUX begins a bold new chapter. For regular readers the issue ends in surprise that will shock you.

The human race has vanished without a trace! Five mighty Atlanteans awaken from the sleep of ages to solve the disappearance of an entire species. But to answer this riddle, their leader Capricia must confront an invading universe of evil and discover the shocking fate that destiny has in store for her. Terra Cognito wants Earth back and only the Atlanteans stand in the way. Also, the greatest Negation invasion force ever assembled marches for Atlantis. But Aristophanes and his villainous new allies have banished Tug, Zephyre and the others from their home. Does Danik hold the key to saving them from destuction?

Verityn and Geromi go for a ride in a vintage 20th Century fighter plane. But what starts as a joyride turns to terror as an airborne menace from the Negation threatens to hunt them down and kill them. At the same time a vast Negation force marches on Atlantis. Will Thraxis survive long enough to warn the Atlanteans?

Terra Cognita returns in force to take the Earth back from the Atlanteans. But these aren't the same ancient philosophers they faced before. Aristophanes and his newly awakened comrades are in charge now and have no tender feelings for anyone who opposes them. It's a war for planet Earth!

Flashpoint! Galvan rebels against his betrayers as Aristophanes brings the war with Terra Cognito to the massive orbiting battle station. The Negation army is nearing Atlantis. The humans are preparing to destroy the ancient city from space. It's a flashpoint for the heroes of Atlantis and the only way to victory is to risk the unthinkable!

The next chapter in the CRUX epic begins here! Atlantis is under attack by the largest Negation force ever, and the famous city's only chance is a risky experiment that will change the world...forever! Jump on board as the arrival of Sergio Cariello (Azrael) kicks this apocalyptic Sci-Fi adventure into overdrive!
Status quo-changing issue! With his city facing annihilation both from human and Negation invaders, Tug makes a decision that will rock Atlantis, and the entire CrossGen Universe, to its core!
Atlantis vs. the Negation... it's all-out war! The newly reinforced Atlanteans collide with the endless hordes of Negation amphibian monsters...and to the victor goes Earth itself!

The long-slumbering Atlanteans are finally awake...now what? The tearful reunions are over, but can the once-great nation rebuild, and rule, this brave new world? Plus: Capricia is back... and she's not happy about what she finds in Atlantis!

It's Atlantean vs. Atlantean.for the fate of Earth! The elder named Udates wants to bring order to the legendary city of Atlantis-but Capricia and Galvan stand in his way! Now, for the first time, see the full extent of their power as these uberbeings go to war.with each other!
The Definitive Directory of the DC Universe containing profiles on characters listed from Icicle to Jonni Thunder.
name: Icicle to Jonni Thunder

volume.name: Who's Who: The Definitive Directory of the DC Universe

description: With the help of the Atlanteans, Thraxis frees the buried alien spacecraft and pilots it to Atlantis. Tug and the others work to free the hundreds of their comrades still in millennia-long slumber. Meanwhile, Geromi has some very unusual friends he wants Zephyre and Verityn to meet.

Zephyre and Verityn go to the Old West portion of Terra Cognito to visit Geromi. But it turns out to be more than a trip to a theme park as Gannish and Yala arrive to make things more interesting for everyone. It's a deadly game of Cowboys vs. Aztecs for the unsuspecting Atlanteans.

deck: The Warriors Three are put on trial for murder.
description: Thor finds out that the Warriors Three have been placed on trial for murder. He helps his friends with their punishment by helping them obtain three apples from Yggdrasil, guarded by a giant eagle; the skin of a pig from Mount Olympus, belonging to Dionysus and guarded by Hercules; a spear in Midgard called "Slaughter", protected by "Chulain, Earth's greatest warrior"; a sword named Grasscutter from the far east, belonging to "The Dead"; finally, a visit to the "tomb of Toth" (presumably Thoth), guarded by his three warrior sons.
name: Part 1 of 6

description: Revelation issue! As Atlantis is torn asunder in a bloody civil war, the enigmatic Danik appears, and reveals the true threat to the city!

When a sudden spate of extraordinary homicides and impossible crimes threatens his city, only detective Simon Archard can separate the guilty from the innocent. Who is he? Where does he come from? All his operatives know for certain about Archard is that he is uncannily gifted and astonishingly intelligent. In fact, one might say inhumanly so.

Detective Simon Archard is in a state his confidante Emma Bishop hasn't seen him in for years: he's hungry. Hungry for information, hungry for insights, hungry for solutions. At last, he's faced with mysteries he cannot solve without leaving his armchair, and he's attacking them with a gleam of excitement in his eyes leaving Emma with a new worry. Archard will find the answers to his questions... even if it kills him.

Detective Simon Archard has long held the key to the city of Partington but he's suddenly finding that it's opening some very ugly doors. The police commissioner, the city fathers in fact, almost all those whom Simon counted as devoted allies, are fast turning against him. The Baroness is doubtless responsible but how, and to what end?

As Ruse's first story arc reaches its climax, detective Simon Archard is sick and tired of playing the part of the hunted... and decides to become the hunter! While actively unraveling the complex schemes of the Baroness, however, Simon not only gets his first glimpse at the heart of her sorcerous power... but Emma manages to accidentally triple it!
With Simon missing following the events of last issue, Emma finds herself responsible for his vast network of agents, all of whom she gives the same assignment: find Simon.

Since Ruse #2, readers have been clamoring for more details regarding the mysterious "Lightbourne," Simon Archard's former partner. Who is he? Where has he been? And why is he making Emma fear for her life? The answers begin to unfold this month!

Simon and Emma's search for the enigmatic Lightbourne takes them on a perilous cross-country journey to a baffling town full or, rather, empty of vanished men! And if Simon cannot solve the mystery of their disappearance before daybreak, neither he nor Emma will live to see the dawn!

The search for Lightbourne has taken Simon and Emma to an eerie, remote village empty of people--or is it? What--or who-- could possibly be stealing an entire town's population during the day--and returning them each night? And how is this bizarre vanishing tied in with the fabled Enigmatic Prism?

Simon has his hands full with a string of small cases, but the big mystery is why he would suddenly abandon the search for Lightbourne just as he and Emma are closing in! Emma's baffled by this turn of events--and matters aren't clarified by the arrival of a new Pressmonk in town!

Story Titles

  • The Horror From the Red Tower - Reprising the classic tale as Conan faces the fiend in the forbidden city of Gaza!
  • The Striking of the Gong - A tale out of time, featuring King Kull.
name: The Horror From the Red Tower; The Striking of the Gong

description: Conan the Conquerer Part One - Re-presenting the first part of Roy Thomas' and Gil Kane's adaptation of Robert E. Howard's only full-length Conan Novel!
name: Conan the Conquerer part 1

description:
Conan the Conquerer: Part Two

  • Chapter I: To Tarantia and the Tower!
  • Chapter II: The Trial in the Temple
  • Chapter III: Swords of the South
name: Conan the Conquerer part 2

description:
Conan the Conquerer: Part Three

  • Chapter I: Corsairs Against Stygia
  • Chapter II: In the Halls of the Dead
  • Chapter III: Out of the Dust Shall
name: Conan the Conquerer part 3; Mirrors of Tuzun Thune

description:
Conan the Conquerer: Part 4

  • Chapter I: Drums of Peril
  • Chapter II: The Road to Acheron

Rattle of Bones - Solomon Kane discovers power and evil in the skeleton of a sorcerer!

Wizards of the Black Sun - Red Sonja, another sorcerer, some tough choices and a talking three-legged goat!
name: Conan the Conquerer part 4; Rattle of Bones; The Chaykin Barbarians; Wizards of the Black Sun
